description: Try our easy to follow Baked Apples recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cooked fruit,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Stone fruit,Soy free,Wheat free,Apple,Peanut free
name: Baked Apples Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Combine apricots, raisins, brown sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl. Core apples and make a shallow cut into the skin around the middle of each. This prevents the apples splitting.

Arrange apples into a large shallow baking dish. Fill cavities with fruit mixture. Dot tops with butter. Pour 1 cup of water into the base of the dish. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve immediately with custard or thick cream.
